title: We're the Chiefs Esports Club - Ask Us Anything!
body:
Hey guys,

For those of you that don't know us, we're the Chiefs. We've won the past 4 Oceanic Pro League titles, and are now chasing our 5th!

Our roster consists of:

Top: Swip3rR
Jungle: Spookz
Mid: Swiffer
ADC: Raes
Support: EGym

Feel free to ask us anything about our history, the game, the upcoming OPL split and more!

You can find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/ChiefsESC and Twitter at www.twitter.com/ChiefsESC.

Thank you to our fans for their undying support, we wouldn't be anywhere without you!

replies.body:
Chief Swip3rR:  Who's the best champion on the patch and why is it Fiora?

Chief Spookz: Advice on tricep exercises?

Chief Swiffer: No question ignore this.

Chief Raes: Have you overcome your fear of VR horror games?

Chief EGym: Do you miss playing Braum?
Fiora is actually the best champ on the patch now... uve triggered me...
Im traumatized from the experience - Raes
dont tell me what to do
Don't @ me ever again.  Also I'm 100% adamant Derek came up with the best draft strategy of the year in that series :/
... we won the series though?
What does winning feel like?
I'll let you know when we get to worlds {{summoner:6}}
@Spookz  Current jungle route? maybe even tips to do with camp experience? :))

Jungle routes are versatile especially in the current meta both in competitive and solo queue, typically you just want to start your path on the opposite side to where you'd ideally like to make a play. A simple approach every time you walk out of base can be to start at the opposite side of the map to where you'd like to make a play so that you can complete all camps and impact the map. This is a very efficient and effective approach you might find in solo queue, of course the jungle role is always reactive to lots of factors but this can give you a good starting point.
(this is spookz btw lol)
What are your favourite games besides League to watch and play?
Overwatch, Minecraft sucks and is for casual gamers.....
M I N E C R A F T
CIv 5 lol
How much does the Quin bench
Hes benching about the bar now, quite an upgrade from his first week.
@anyone If you win the oceanic league for the 5th time what are your plans for the future?
Win it for the 6th and 7th times obviously.. (^:
@raes how do u survive a nocturne jumping my ass and 1 shotting me on ad. Also why are u a pussy who plays cait? like play a manly champ like teemo.
@Swiffer whats it like being the best looking bloke in the professional LoL scene?
Shout-out to Swiffer for being such an eye candy! üòç LOVE YOU SWIFFER!
@Swiffer When you're playing Swain does Spooks get jealous that you already have a crutch in your lane?
@kinkiedude You don't deserve a response {{summoner:14}}

@anyone - What's the most important feature for you to define a team as good? 

@all - If you could choose, would you rather have a stronger emphasis in your own defined style, or just fit to the meta as it shifts?
I'm a meta shifter so, not like bryce =:)
As long as i have the option the play a tank or Illaoi, im happy.

**What's the most important feature for you to define a team as good?**
I feel like at this stage of League of Legends you can find a million players with a good set of fingers that can be good individually, communication and synergy is by far the strongest trait a player can have.  So teams that don't communicate will will never be good in my eyes.

---

**If you could choose, would you rather have a stronger emphasis in your own defined style, or just fit to the meta as it shifts?**
100% own style.  I want to have balls as big as Likkrit and play triple warmogs tank anivia support at worlds!
@ Swiffer , Why did you delete me from your friends list?
Limited real estate, sorry =( {{summoner:13}}
And I'm still on it xD
Where's the best place to eat after a victorious series?
Bloody hurricanes mate

do you wish u were good and slim?

if so, who is your idol for slimming and gooding?
denian how is it that you have electricity in your swamp

@Swip3rR - although you still manage to have a large influence across the whole map for a top laner - does being on the top 'island' get frustrating at times?

@Swiffer - which mid laner do you least look forward to matching up against at the moment in the OPL and why?
Looking forward to finally playing against Claire. He's always been such a talent that hasn't had the opportunity to play until now and I can't wait to SOLO KILL HIM~~~~~~ {{summoner:31}}
Why did jish leave us :(? ?

I have been struggling to get an answer with this for about 5+ years now.

How does one get around the luck factor of teammates in solo queue?

I want to know exactly how I can bypass having teammates dictate the results of a game, or how I can control them to make the right decisions.
@EGym, late question here (was watching the OCS this evening). Do you think Sona could be a possible pick to counter Malzahar in lane, in both pro games or soloqueue only?

Sounds a bit iffy to me tbh.  Effective range isn't much longer than Malz which makes you a pretty easy ult target at 6, and you don't have any way to easily kill his voidlings like other counters such as Lulu.

I haven't actually played it though so maybe how it looks in my head isn't how the matchup actually goes?  I'll give it a go!
OK thanks for the reply, maybe test it out vs Geocrad lol.

Who wins in a 1v1?

Spookz Jhin vs eGym Caitlyn

Hey there. I'm new to jungling on graves. I'd like to ask, what's the best thing to do after I recall. Some of my camps aren't up and i'm not really "sure" where to go. Do i just go back to where i started?

And another question is if I see their jungler top side and I want to take their bot side jungle, is it ideal to take my camps first or just take their bot side camps and do my camps later?

@ Chief Swip3rR.

Still play osrs?
@zeratul was lukeafied pretty heavy when you were on cellar squad :^) kappa ..... Allnighters at netcafix Tonight !!
